title: Shimano UNSUNG Video Celebrates Three Heros of the Gravel Community
content:
This time around, Shimano’s UNSUNG video series touches on some “unsung” heroes of the gravel scene. This video follows three people who make the Unbound event so great.

Michelle Duffy, Linda Guerrette, and Wayne Smith contribute their special talents to the gravel community. Those talented roles appear in the form of a photographer, an event organizer, and rider support/mechanic. Injecting their passion into what they do, behind the scenes at an event like Unbound, most definitely ensures a successful future for the sport.

Ride.Shimano.com

The post Shimano UNSUNG Video Celebrates Three Heros of the Gravel Community appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
